posts.post_content:
I've undertaken the unlikely task of completing the Matty Dark Cap back run.

At this point, I still need the following backs:
BL460
Drum
EPDG
SC 350/25
SC 460/42 (No OP)

I am looking for low grade (1-2), and would be open to either purchase or trade.

Picture outdated, but still fun to see.

Thanks for looking! 
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20201213/9d3be0fde9212b602b19d566b88a04f0.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://uploads.tapatalk-cdn.com/20201213/8e79ca4b8b2aa1afdefe3fdb8b038781.jpg[/IMG]


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

Nice collection! Let me know if you’re ever looking to sell one of your duplicates. I’ve been jonesing for a dark cap Matty for a while! 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

best wishes!
